The 'Basques' (, , ) are an ethnic
group TotoricagÃ¼ena, G. Identity, Culture, and
Politics in the Basque Diaspora (2003) p.59 University of Nevada Press
which primarily inhabit an area traditionally known as the Basque Country (),
a region that is located around the western end of the Pyrenees on the coast
of the Bay of Biscay and straddles parts of north-central Spain and south-
western France.

The Basques are known as: *Euskaldunak in Basque (this ethnonym means "the
speakers of the Basque language"; to refer to all the inhabitants of the Basque
Country, the name euskal herritarrak is preferred) *Vascos in Spanish *Basques
in French and English. *Bascos in Gascon
